subject: GUI component testing using JUnit
msgSnippet: Hello, I have an application which has various swings controls. Is it possible to test the functionality of these controls using JUnit? If Yes, then how do we
messageBody:
Hello, I have an application which has various swings controls. Is it
possible to test the functionality of these controls using JUnit? If
Yes, then how do we access the GUI Control which is declared in its
method within the class.
